TopicTitle: I've found the sand castle easter egg!

Articles.Content:
I was just starting ksp up normally and so pumped to play .25 and then i'm like OMG I'VE SEEN THE SAND CASTLE EASTER EGG FOR THE FIRST TIME

I didn't have my recording software started at the time to take a screenshot so i prnt screened but it's gone now D:

But i've found it hopefully i can see it again and this time prnt screen it again!

I only saw it once, and that was in the demo... I guess they just lowered the chances of it appearing, and did not remove it by accident like I originally thought.

Edited October 11, 2014 by Rthsom

You mean the Mun castle on the start screen? Interesting, I've seen no reports of that for quite a long time, so I THINK it's been broken. I guess .25 fixed it? I used to see it all the time in .16- like .20 or something.
Well maybe because i never saw it in earlier versions but my first time on .25 i see it so im guessing so haha!
I also saw it once in the demo, but never in the full version. Interesting...

I also saw it once in the demo, but never in the full version. Interesting...

pretty much what I was saying, the demo is .18, and I think it has been broken for a while. THIS thread is why I think that.

Congratulations

But there are way more things in KSP to find
as of .24 there was a 1 in 40 chance of seeing it, maybe they upped the chance in .25?
F1 takes a screenshot in game in KSP. Goes to the screenshots folder in the game folder.

What a misleading clickbait of a title...

One would think you've actually found the sandcastle on the surface of Mun and you are here to give us the coordinates.

Seeing it in the title screen is not notable. It happens every now and then.
